txt_en: All great achievements require time.
txt_cn: 所有伟大的成就都需要时间的历练。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: You do not write your life with words. You write it with actions.
txt_cn: 你不是用文字来书写你的人生的，而是用行动。
author: Patrick Ness

txt_en: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
txt_cn: 爱情不识藩篱。它将跨栏杆、越栅栏、穿围墙，满怀憧憬地抵达终点。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
txt_cn: 没有什么比温柔更有力量，也没有什么比真正的力量更温柔。
author: Saint Francis de Sales

txt_en: You make a life out of what you have, not what you're missing.
txt_cn: 你是靠自己所拥有的，而不是所缺少的来过你的人生。
author: Kate Morton

txt_en: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
txt_cn: 永远别去后悔。若结果美好，那很精彩。若结果糟糕，那是经历。
author: Victoria Holt

txt_en: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
txt_cn: 你不去射门的话，就百分之百进不了球。
author: Wayne Gretzky

txt_en: Life's a mixed bag, no matter who you are.
txt_cn: 生活总是喜忧参半，无论你是谁。
author: 《时空恋旅人》

txt_en: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
txt_cn: 能拥有一些难以割舍的东西，这是多么幸运啊。
author: A.A. Milne

txt_en: Dreams are like stars. You may never touch them, but if you follow them, they will lead you to your destiny.
txt_cn: 梦想就像星星。也许你永远无法触碰，但如果你跟随它们，它们将引领你找到人生的路。
author: Liam Payne

txt_en: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
txt_cn: 与他人分享快乐，我们会收获加倍的快乐。
author: A. Nielsen

txt_en: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence — hard work.
txt_cn: 克服自信低潮的艰难时期，我只用一个方法：努力。
author: David Beckham

txt_en: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
txt_cn: 昨天的我聪明，所以我想改变世界；今天的我明智，所以我选择改变自己。
author: Rumi

txt_en: You've always had the power my dear, you just had to learn it for yourself.
txt_cn: 其实你一直有那份力量，你只是需要学着去使用它。
author: 《绿野仙踪》

txt_en: You don't love someone because they're perfect. You love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
txt_cn: 不是因为一个人完美你才爱，而是即使那人不完美你也会去爱。
author: Jodi Picoult

txt_en: What is right is not always popular, and what is popular is not always right.
txt_cn: 对的事不见得都受欢迎，受欢迎的事不见得都是对的。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
txt_cn: 相信自己就对了，你将知道如何过日子。
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

txt_en: Be careful how you judge people, most of all friends. You don't sum up a man's life in one moment.
txt_cn: 小心你是怎么评判他人的，尤其是朋友。你不能在片刻间总结一个人的一生。
author: Al Pacino

txt_en: Dew turns into frost since tonight; the moon viewed at home is more bright.
txt_cn: 露从今夜白，月是故乡明。
author: 杜甫《月夜忆舍弟》（许渊冲 译）

txt_en: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
txt_cn: 如果一切皆完美，你就永远不会学到东西，永远不会成长。
author: Beyonce Knowles

txt_en: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
txt_cn: 我不惧怕暴风雨，因为我正在学习如何驾驭我的船。
author: 《小妇人》
